=== Current Issues ===
<pre>
No option to hibernate
No scrolling on the trackpad
No right click solution for single button trackpad
No double tap on the trackpad
No 3D acceleration
No external video via DVI
</pre>
=== System Info ===
Note: I ran these tests on a 1Ghz model, but these tests should be the same on any PowerBook5,2.  This was the first PowerBook model to introduce FW800 and ranged in speed from 1Ghz to 1.33Ghz.
<nowiki>[[http://support.apple.com/specs/powerbook/PowerBook_G4_15-inch_FW800.html|Apple Spec Page]]</nowiki>
